products.title: Sumi Chalk Roman Blind
products.description: Giving your windows impact doesn't always have to be bold and brash. In fact, this sumi chalk roman blind is pretty bold in its geometric pattern that it doesn't need colour to back it up. It stands on its own with the soft neutral shades, as well as making it a versatile choice giving your windows impact doesn't always have to be bold and brash.

products.description: Enjoy a dash of contemporary glamour with the windsor canvas curtain. Made from a sleek cotton-blend fabric and beautifully enhanced with strands of metallic yarn in a soft and curving motif, this curtain is sure to sparkle at your window. The pale neutral toned fabric is backed with a full lining, enhancing the look and quality of this curtain. products.title: Splash Snow - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash snow light filtering skylight blind, is an attractive pure white colour which is the perfect blind to help transform a space. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Nairobi, Snow - Roman Blind
products.description: The nairobi in snow adds a casual sense of glamour to any room, with its chocolate animal print and beautiful sketches. The fabric contains linen, giving it lasting durability as well as that classic linen look and feel. Hang the snow amidst similar browns and creams, and consider a deep chocolate feature wall for a striking look. Add shimmering golds and plush camels for a truly luxurious style, and be sure to throw in plenty of soft fabrics for extra comfort.

products.title: Astral, Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to reinvent your interiors and breathe new life into proceedings, your window spaces hold the key. Astral snow enables you to introduce a soft grey and a creamy base colour so that you have plenty of new creative avenues you could go down. It's all about simple neutral colours that subtly transform into one another when you want that relaxing homely vibe. Magnolia walls, a light stained wooden floor, and a few lamps rather than dazzling overhead lighting are all you really need to make things nice and cosy.

products.title: Splash Snow White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room. Perfect fit roller blinds clip straight onto the window, which provides a hassle free, no drilling way to update your window. The framework comes in 4 different shades to match your window frame. This fabric is also moisture resistant making it the perfect choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Paper White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash paper white perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this offf-white perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Ivory Off-white Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Ivory off-white is a fabulous shade, perfect to pair with natural wooden tones in the home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Frost Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash frost perfect fit roller blinds are a beautiful, fresh & crisp white colour. They are particularly well suited to kitchens and bathrooms as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. The blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.

products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cotton White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cotton white is a semi-translucent stylish, light white perfect fit roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame retardant coating makes this sheer perfect fit roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Genesis White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This white perfect fit roller blind is ideal to add a fresh feel to any room in your home and will also go with existing decor due to the neutral tone of the fabric. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws.
